Package project.utilities

Class SMDate

java.lang.Object
java.util.Date
project.utilities.SMDate
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<java.util.Date>
public class SMDate
extends java.util.Date
The official formatted date object of the app. All dates in Social Magnet follows the format of dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • getPlantedTime

      public int getPlantedTime​(SMDate plantedDateTime)
      Converts plantedDateTime to number of minutes of how long it has been since the crop is planted
      Parameters:
      plantedDateTime - SMDate format of planted time
      Returns:
      number of minutes since it has been planted Used to calculate growth percentage and whether crop should wilt

    • getTimeDifferenceInMinutes

      public static int getTimeDifferenceInMinutes​(SMDate date)
      This method is used to generate the number of minutes that the current time is from the input datetime.
      Parameters:
      date - input datetime to compare against
      Returns:
      the number of minutes since the input datetime

    • checkIfSentWithinOneDay

      public static boolean checkIfSentWithinOneDay​(SMDate date)
      This method is made especially for gifts, to check whether 24 hours has passed from the input date time
      Parameters:
      date - input datetime to check
      Returns:
      true / false of whether it has been 24 hours
